text:
mod_ftp currently doesn't support commands like SITE SEARCH and SITE CHMOD (and its other brothers).

I find SITE CHMOD to be very handy aswel as other commands like SITE SEARCH.

Unfortunately I couldn't find any RFC for these and from my short exploration there doesn't seem to be a clear standard :(

although the FTPServer project does support some other SITE commands:
http://incubator.terra-intl.com/projects/ftpserver/site_cmd.html

but I would like to request this as an enhancement for later releases.
